definition: erhua variant of 幹活|干活[gan4 huo2]
tree trunk/main part of sth/to manage/to work/to do/capable/cadre/to kill (slang)/to fuck (vulgar)

sentences.english: Then he would stand up and clapped his hands and said that he would stop playing to continue his work.
sentences.chinese: 然後爬起來，拍拍手說，不玩了，又繼續幹活兒去了。

sentences.english: If he should come here, he would help us with our work.
sentences.chinese: 如果他真能來這兒的話，他會幫助我們幹活兒的。

sentences.english: One day he saw a farmer working in the field. The farmer was working very hard under the hot sun.
sentences.chinese: 一天，他看到一位農民叔叔在炎熱的天氣下地幹活兒。

sentences.english: He touched them on the head and went on working.
sentences.chinese: 然後他摸摸他們的頭，嘿嘿笑着繼續幹活兒。

sentences.english: The children are busy as bees , helping their mother in the garden .
sentences.chinese: 孩子們忙個不停地在花園裏幫母親幹活兒。

sentences.english: “They really wanted to work it out with me,” she says.
sentences.chinese: “他們真的想和我一起出去幹活兒，”她說。

sentences.english: I work here by day and I am paid by the day.
sentences.chinese: 我白天在這兒幹活兒，按日計酬。
我們明天晚上還幹活兒。

sentences.english: You must still work in your father's shamba , along with your duties here.
sentences.chinese: 你不僅要忙這裏，還必須給你父親的農場幹活兒。

sentences.english: North Koreans work in the fields near Panmunjom in the demilitarized zone.
sentences.chinese: 在非軍事區板門店附近，北朝鮮人在田裏幹活兒。

sentences.english: He has a bunch of sharecroppers working for him.
sentences.chinese: 他有一幫收益分成的佃農幫他幹活兒。

sentences.english: Hopefully this will get resolved soon, and the Federal Government will go back to work.
sentences.chinese: 希望這件事儘快得到解決，聯邦政府趕緊回去幹活兒。

sentences.english: Because he works very carefully, he has not produced a reject in the last six years.
sentences.chinese: 因爲他幹活兒很仔細，所以連續6年不出廢品。

sentences.english: I can work outside all day, breaking ice to get water for washing;
sentences.chinese: 我能整天在戶外幹活兒，敲碎冰塊，取水洗衣。

sentences.english: Old John kept right on hammering.
sentences.chinese: 老約翰只管繼續敲敲打打地幹活兒。
